TopicTitle: Unable to launch any craft in .25

Articles.Content:
Ok so just got around to trying out .25 and went to try out .25 using a NEW sandbox. proceeded to load a stock Kerbal X rocket and sent it to the launchpad to launch it. it went through a normal length loading time before going to the pad, however as soon as the pad loaded my screen showed this:

Which then transitioned to show as zoomed out view of Kerbin except for the ground like this:

with the velocity and altitude at 0 but the atmosphere indicator showing out of atmosphere. I am then unable to zoom in turn the camera or do practically anything typically leading to having to close the game from the desktop. Have tried to launch different craft including planes all with the same result. This issue has led to .25 being unplayable on my computer.

KSP version: stock .25.0642

System Specs: Dell latitude e6530 running win7 64 bit pro version. Intel i5 2.5 ghz with 4 Gb ram and Nvidia 5200 NVS GPU.

Was able to run .24.2 with no problems, and was really hoping somebody on here could help me resolve this so I can get back to KSP quickly.
Have you tried deleting the whole KSP folder and redownloading? That worked for me, but I use Steam. Still should work the same from the KSP store, I suppose.

32 or 64 bit KSP?

And I second the "try to redownload and/or reinstall."

~Claw
I am running the 32 bit version and reinstalling did solve the problem. On a minor note the news feed on the launcher remains blanks. Any ideas there?
